LandingPage.PageDescriptionText: Our hair care products are recognized and respected around the world. They help consumers look good and feel good — and in turn get more out of life.

ProductGroup.Title: Dove Nutritive Therapy Nourishing Oil Care Shampoo/Conditioner
ProductGroup.GroupDescription: A unique blend with non-greasy natural almond and mineral oils that are so fine, they are rapidly absorbed to deeply nourish and replenish essential nutrients. It's next generation nourishment for beautifully smooth, soft, shiny hair.

Product.SubHeading: Dove Nutritive Therapy Oil Care Shampoo
Dove Nutritive Therapy Oil Care Conditioner

ProductGroup.Title: NEXXUS PRO•MEND Shampoo/Conditioner
ProductGroup.GroupDescription: ProMend Split End Treatment Daily Shampoo and Split End Daily Conditioner gently cleanse and nourish your hair while actually repairing split ends.

ProductGroup.Title: Suave Humectant
ProductGroup.GroupDescription: Moisturizing shampoo and conditioner enriched with a panthenol and keratin serum gently cleanses and nourishes hair, leaving it healthy looking, soft, and manageable.

ProductGroup.Title: TRESemmé Climate Control
ProductGroup.GroupDescription: Moisturizing shampoo and conditioner enriched with a panthenol and keratin serum gently cleanses and nourishes hair, leaving it healthy looking, soft, and manageable.
